title: War bite
description: This is the book i am working on right now. This is the first serious book i started writing and i am writing in english, which is not my main language so don't judge it yet i will refine it nicely. I just want to see what people think about first 2 chapters of my story.The main plot is this. American solider Mathew in 1945 in france gets wounded and at field hospital he meets Jessica who works as nurse. They fall in love with each other and after a party soldiers made to celebrate their withdrawall from the front line she gets jelous because a drunk girl kissed Mathew. She runs away from the party and gets bitten by a vampire who does not kill her because he was seen by Mathew. Vampire wants to kill mathew since he is the only withness of the incident and he thinks the girl is dead but she becomes a vampire. I wont reveal everything for now that is just the begining of the book. Enjoy and please PLEASE rate or review. :D
author: Zeljko Djokovic
